name: **Dog Island – _Oileán an Mhadra_**
description: Dog Island – Oileán an Mhadra L846-212 Sheet 44 A small island, about 500m off Lettermullan, Dog Island marks the whereabouts (on circumnavigation) of a beautiful, small beach on the southern side of Lettermullan. Smooth and rounded glacier-scoured, grass-topped rock, which could just about be camped on. Land on the sheltered, rocky, inter-tidal area on the N side at the storm beach.
